```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(visdat)
library(janitor)
```


```{r}
df <- read_csv("data-raw/data_waste.csv")
head(df)
```
Let us clean the names of the variables

```{r}
df_waste <- clean_names(df)
head(df_waste)
```

# Hazardous waste

```{r}
df_haz <- df_waste %>% filter(category == "Hazardous wastes")
df_haz_tot <- df_haz %>% filter(stream == "Total")
df_haz_total <- df_haz_tot %>% group_by(year,jurisdiction,category) %>% 
  summarise(Tonnes = sum(tonnes)) %>% ungroup()
```


```{r}
pl1 <- ggplot(data = df_haz_total,aes(x = year,y = Tonnes)) +
  geom_point() + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45,size=5)) + facet_wrap(~jurisdiction)
pl1
```
